text: @thomaskaine5 COVID-19 loves to travel also! It also likes casinos! But I googled the Book on Biden’s VP pick and Harris so far is odds on favorite with Susan Rice a length back! My long shot Katie Porter isn’t in competition but the race ain’t over yet!
